=Maturity of Global Goods: Summary Table=
This table reflects the maturity model baseline assessments and the latest reassessment of global goods funded through Digital Square. All maturity model assessments are *self-reported* by the funded organization leading the software development of the global good. For more information about global good maturity models, please contact Carl Fourie at cfourie@path.org.

==Digital Square Maturity Model Details==
To help identify areas of investments for global goods, Digital Square has developed maturity models for 2 of the types of global goods:
* [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16nZHBsb6Zjsh9T_7Fj7zvMXUspjh39CNSS76UT6WHJU/edit#gid=0 Software Global Good Maturity Model] for Software digital health tools. 
* [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1c975UJiXfSjRywbGRJZJSBaqhCxTpkrGrSnduVJtTtw/edit#gid=0 Content Global Good Maturity Model] for Content Global Goods.

We continue to engage the digital health community, in particular the [https://www.healthdatacollaborative.org/how-we-work/digital-health-interoperability-working-group/ Digital Health and Interoperability Working Group] of the [https://www.healthdatacollaborative.org/ Health Data Collaborative], in the development of this model.

=== Maturity Model: Software Global Good  ===
Currently, the Software Global Good maturity model is in version 1.4, last updated August 2022. The initial version (1.1) was presented at the [https://www.mhealthworkinggroup.org/content/global-digital-health-forum-2017 Global Digital Health Forum] in December of 2017.

<googlespreadsheet width="100%" height="800" style="width: 100%">1n4wJi6hzk0hwzHm6pgO-E0Y9J1nC4a6T</googlespreadsheet>

=== Maturity Model: Content Global Good  ===
Currently, the Content Global Good maturity model is in version 1.0, last updated June 2023. 

<googlespreadsheet width="100%" height="800" style="width: 100%">1c975UJiXfSjRywbGRJZJSBaqhCxTpkrGrSnduVJtTtw/htmlembed?widget=true#gid=0</googlespreadsheet>
